properties.Name: CustomerPaymentMethod
properties.Description: The Payment Method(s) that are acceptable or suitable from the Customer for purchases/transactions of the associated amount and period.

Columns.Name: CustomerId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Customer.

Columns.Name: PaymentMethodId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Payment Method.

Columns.Name: MinimumTransactionAmount
Columns.Description: The minimum transaction amount in the associated transaction range for which the associated Payment Method(s) are acceptable or applicable.

Columns.Name: MaximumTransactionAmount
Columns.Description: The maximum transaction amount in the associated transaction range for which the associated Payment Method(s) are acceptable or applicable.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period start date for which the associated customer payment method information is defined.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period end date for which the associated customer payment method information is defined.

Columns.Name: CustomerPaymentMethodNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the customer payment method.
